ya2.2.2:134.1: Sabbesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:134.2: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:138.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:139.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:139.2: Itaresaṃ pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:140.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:141.1: Pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:141.2: Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:142.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:143.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:143.2: Itaresaṃ catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:144.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:145.1: Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:145.2: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:147.1: ⇒ Yassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:148.1: Sabbesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:148.2: Arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:149.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:150.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:150.2: Arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:151.1: ⇒ Yassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:152.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:156.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:157.1: Pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:157.2: Arūpe parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:158.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:159.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:159.2: Arūpe parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:160.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:161.1: Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:161.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:162.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:163.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:163.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:166.1: ⇒ Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:167.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:167.2: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:168.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:169.1: ⇒ Yassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:170.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:170.2: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:171.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:175.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:176.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:176.2: Itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:177.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:178.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:178.2: Itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:179.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:180.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:180.2: Itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:181.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:182.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:182.2: Itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:184.1: ⇒ Yassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:185.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:186.1: ⇒ Yassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:187.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:191.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:192.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:192.2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhittha, vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:193.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:194.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:194.2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:195.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:196.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:196.2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:197.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:198.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:198.2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhittha.
